abstract_summ: The COVID-19 pandemic has been recognized as an unprecedented global health crisis . This is the first observational study to evaluate its impact on the orthopedic workload in a London level 1 trauma center . Acute trauma referrals in the post-COVID period were almost halved compared with 2019 . Hip fractures and polytrauma cases accounted for an additional 11% of the modal number of injuries in 2020 .
